item.title: Rodenstock is bringing back vintage shapes and sizes in eyewear
item.description:
At the start of 2014, fashion icon Claudia Schiffer and German eyewear company Rodenstock debuted their first collaborative eyewear collection. Later, in September, they launched an autumn/winter collection, featuring fresh color variations for several styles. “Sunglasses are a simple yet impactful way to define a look,” explains Schiffer, who serves as Creative Director for the collection. “Paired with the right coat, bag, or jeans, the right pair can make a real statement...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/rodenstock-is-bringing-back-vintage-shapes-and-sizes-in-eyewear/
